regen.absent_element: configurable alert thresholds for triggering alerts
regen.new_specification: The system shall allow administrators to configure alert thresholds for system resources, triggering alerts when these thresholds are exceeded.

regen.new_specification: The system shall allow administrators to configure alert thresholds for system resources to trigger alerts when threshold values are exceeded.
